job_description: You will be a member of the above group, which is responsible for:Provide Technical Support for Hydro One Telecom and Hydro One Networks Fibre Optic Transport equipment and networks. Your job duties may include:Circuit and equipment provisioning, remote maintenance testing and verifications on fibre optic equipment, radios and associated equipment, software programming/scripting for automation of operational procedures, documentation and database updates, Network Management server administration. This job will provide you with the following professional development:One will obtain an understanding of the telecom industry/field, Operations and Change Management processes.  Hands on experience in configuration of Fibre Optic network equipment and telecom networking associated equipment. Hands on experience in using various Server and workstation operating systems such as HP/SUN UNIX, Windows 20xx, Windows 7.
